attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i live in kent and am continually held hostage to the tolls at dartford..last evening there was 24 miles of trafic leading to the bridge and all because of the tolls... i spent 3hrs in my car to cover 14 miles
help us please and make them open the tolls when its busy

rejection.details: This is a matter for your local authority.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
